df-lly
blocks.content: Define a space that is locally ` A ` , where ` A ` is a topological property like "compact", "connected", or "path-connected". A topological space is locally ` A ` if every neighborhood of a point contains an open sub-neighborhood that is ` A ` in the subspace topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lly(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  |- wceq(clly(c0), crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cin(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(co(cv(s0), crest, cv(s3)), c0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-lly(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  ⊢ Locally(c0)= { s0 ∈ Top | ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∀(s2 ∈ s1, ∃(s3 ∈(s0 ⋂ P(s1)),(s2 ∈ s3 ∧(s0[|`t]s3)∈ c0))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: df-nlly
blocks.content: Define a space that is n-locally ` A ` , where ` A ` is a topological property like "compact", "connected", or "path-connected". A topological space is n-locally ` A ` if every neighborhood of a point contains a sub-neighborhood that is ` A ` in the subspace topology. The terminology "n-locally", where 'n' stands for "neighborhood", is not standard, although this is sometimes called "weakly locally ` A ` ". The reason for the distinction is that some notions only make sense for arbitrary neighborhoods (such as "locally compact", which is actually ` N-Locally Comp ` in our terminology - open compact sets are not very useful), while others such as "locally connected" are strictly weaker notions if the neighborhoods are not required to be open. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nlly(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cnlly(c0), crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cin(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s2))), cpw(cv(s1))), wcel(co(cv(s0), crest, cv(s3)), c0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-nlly(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  ⊢ N-Locally(c0)= { s0 ∈ Top | ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∀(s2 ∈ s1, ∃(s3 ∈(((nei ` s0)` { s2 })⋂ P(s1)),(s0[|`t]s3)∈ c0)))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
}

thm islly(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {

  ralbidv(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s2)), c1))), wrex(s2, cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s2)), c1))))
  rexeqbidv(s2, cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(s0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s2)), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s2)), c1)))

  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, crest, cv(s2))
  df-lly(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s2)), c1))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)

thm islly(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Locally(c1)↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈(c0 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(c0[|`t]s2)∈ c1))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s1, s2)

  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, Locally(c1), ctop, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈(c0 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(c0[|`t]s2)∈ c1)))), ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈(hs0 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0[|`t]s2)∈ c1)))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈(hs0 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0[|`t]s2)∈ c1))), ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈(c0 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(c0[|`t]s2)∈ c1))))
  ralbidv(s1, s0, hs0 = c0, ∃(s2 ∈(hs0 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0[|`t]s2)∈ c1)), ∃(s2 ∈(c0 ⋂ P(s0)),(s1 ∈ s2 ∧(c0[|`t]s2)∈ c1)))
  rexeqbidv(s2, (hs0 ⋂ P(s0)), (c0 ⋂ P(s0)), hs0 = c0, (s1 ∈ s2 ∧(hs0[|`t]s2)∈ c1), (s1 ∈ s2 ∧(c0[|`t]s2)∈ c1))
  ineq1(hs0, c0, P(s0))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, s1 ∈ s2, (hs0[|`t]s2)∈ c1, (c0[|`t]s2)∈ c1)
  eleq1d((hs0[|`t]s2), c1, (c0[|`t]s2), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, crest, s2)
  df-lly(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c1)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  3eqtr4g(clly(c0), clly(c1), crab(hs2, ctop, wral(hs3, cv(hs2), wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wrex(hs1, cin(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, cv(hs1)), c0)))))), crab(hs2, ctop, wral(hs3, cv(hs2), wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wrex(hs1, cin(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, cv(hs1)), c1)))))), wceq(c0, c1))
  rabbidv(hs2, ctop, wceq(c0, c1), wral(hs3, cv(hs2), wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wrex(hs1, cin(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, cv(hs1)), c0))))), wral(hs3, cv(hs2), wral(hs0, cv(hs3), wrex(hs1, cin(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, cv(hs1)), c1))))))
  2ralbidv(hs3, hs0, cv(hs2), cv(hs3), wceq(c0, c1), wrex(hs1, cin(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, cv(hs1)), c0))), wrex(hs1, cin(cv(hs2), cpw(cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), crest, cv(hs1)), c1))))

thm llyeq(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 → Locally(c0)= Locally(c1))

  elind(s1, s0, P(s1), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧(s1 ∈ s0 ∧ hs0 ∈ s1)))
  simprl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), s1 ∈ s0, hs0 ∈ s1)

blocks.content: An alternative expression for ` J e. Locally A ` when ` A ` passes to open subspaces: A space is locally ` A ` if every point is contained in an open neighborhood with property ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)

thm islly2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ Locally(c1)↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s1 ∧(c0[|`t]s1)∈ c1))))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ c1 ∧ s3 ∈ s2))→(s2[|`t]s3)∈ c1)
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)

blocks.name: loclly
blocks.content: If ` A ` is a local property, then both ` Locally A ` and ` N-Locally A ` simplify to ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm loclly(class c0) {
  |- wb(wceq(clly(c0), c0), wceq(cnlly(c0), c0))
} = {
  impbii(wceq(clly(c0), c0), wceq(cnlly(c0), c0))
  eqtrd(cnlly(c0), c0, clly(c0), wceq(clly(c0), c0))
  restnlly(hs1, hs0, c0, wceq(clly(c0), c0))
  eleqtrd(co(cv(hs1), crest, cv(hs0)), c0, clly(c0), wa(wceq(clly(c0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wceq(clly(c0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), crest, cv(hs0)), clly(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), clly(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eleqtrrd(cv(hs1), clly(c0), c0, wa(wceq(clly(c0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  simprl(wceq(clly(c0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  simprr(wceq(clly(c0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  llyrest(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))
  simpl(wceq(clly(c0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  id(wceq(clly(c0), c0))
  eqtr3d(clly(c0), c0, cnlly(c0), wceq(cnlly(c0), c0))
  restnlly(hs1, hs0, c0, wceq(cnlly(c0), c0))
  eleqtrd(co(cv(hs1), crest, cv(hs0)), c0, cnlly(c0), wa(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), crest, cv(hs0)), cnlly(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cnlly(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eleqtrrd(cv(hs1), cnlly(c0), c0, wa(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  simprl(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  simprr(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  nllyrest(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))
  simpl(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  id(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(clly(c0), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(clly(c0), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cnlly(c0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm loclly(class c0) {
  ⊢ (Locally(c0)= c0 ↔ N-Locally(c0)= c0)
} = {
  impbii(Locally(c0)= c0, N-Locally(c0)= c0)
  eqtrd(N-Locally(c0), c0, Locally(c0), Locally(c0)= c0)
  restnlly(hs1, hs0, c0, Locally(c0)= c0)
  eleqtrd((hs1[|`t]hs0), c0, Locally(c0), (Locally(c0)= c0 ∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1)))
  syl2anc((Locally(c0)= c0 ∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1)), (hs1[|`t]hs0)∈ Locally(c0), hs1 ∈ Locally(c0), hs0 ∈ hs1)
  eleqtrrd(hs1, Locally(c0), c0, (Locally(c0)= c0 ∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1)))
  simprl(Locally(c0)= c0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  simprr(Locally(c0)= c0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  llyrest(hs1, c0, hs0)
  simpl(Locally(c0)= c0, (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1))
  id(Locally(c0)= c0)
  eqtr3d(Locally(c0), c0, N-Locally(c0), N-Locally(c0)= c0)
  restnlly(hs1, hs0, c0, N-Locally(c0)= c0)
  eleqtrd((hs1[|`t]hs0), c0, N-Locally(c0), (N-Locally(c0)= c0 ∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1)))
  syl2anc((N-Locally(c0)= c0 ∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1)), (hs1[|`t]hs0)∈ N-Locally(c0), hs1 ∈ N-Locally(c0), hs0 ∈ hs1)
  eleqtrrd(hs1, N-Locally(c0), c0, (N-Locally(c0)= c0 ∧(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1)))
  simprl(N-Locally(c0)= c0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  simprr(N-Locally(c0)= c0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1)
  nllyrest(hs1, c0, hs0)
  simpl(N-Locally(c0)= c0, (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1))
  id(N-Locally(c0)= c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(Locally(c0)= c0)
  diff.hs0.w(Locally(c0)= c0)
  diff.hs1.w(N-Locally(c0)= c0)
  diff.hs0.w(N-Locally(c0)= c0)
}

blocks.name: llyidm

blocks.origin:

  ssriv(hs0, clly(clly(c0)), clly(c0))
  sylanbrc(wcel(cv(hs0), clly(clly(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), clly(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), ctop), wral(hs3, cv(hs0), wral(hs1, cv(hs3), wrex(hs2, cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(hs2)), c0))))))

blocks.name: nllyidm
blocks.content: Idempotence of the "n-locally" predicate, i.e. being "n-locally ` A ` " is a local property. (Use ~ loclly to show ` N-Locally N-Locally A = N-Locally A ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: cldllycmp
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a locally compact space is also locally compact. (The analogous result for open subspaces follows from the more general ~ nllyrest .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: dislly
blocks.content: The discrete space ` ~P X ` is locally ` A ` if and only if every singleton space has property ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dislly(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cpw(c0), clly(c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cpw(csn(cv(s0))), c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), clly(c2)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cpw(csn(cv(s0))), c2)))

blocks.name: dis1stc

  ax-mp(wcel(cpw(csn(cv(hs0))), ctb), wcel(cpw(csn(cv(hs0))), ctop))

  snex(cv(hs0))
  distop(csn(cv(hs0)), universe)
  topbas(cpw(csn(cv(hs0))))
  ax-mp(wbr(cpw(csn(cv(hs0))), cdom, com), wbr(cpw(csn(cv(hs0))), csdm, com))
  mpbi(wbr(cpw(csn(cv(hs0))), csdm, com), wcel(cpw(csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))

blocks.name: hausmapdom
blocks.content: If ` X ` is a first-countable Hausdorff space, then the cardinality of the closure of a set ` A ` is bounded by ` NN ` to the power ` A ` . In particular, a first-countable Hausdorff space with a dense subset ` A ` has cardinality at most ` A ^ NN ` , and a separable first-countable Hausdorff space has cardinality at most ` ~P NN ` . (Compare ~ hauspwpwdom to see a weaker result if the assumption of first-countability is omitted.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, c1stc), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c1, cmap, cn)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(clm, c0), cv(hs0)))), wex(hs1, wa(wf(cv(hs1), cn, c1), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(clm, c0), cv(hs0)))))

  bitr4d((c0 ∈ Haus ∧ c0 ∈ 1stc ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), hs0 ∈((cls ` c0)` c1), ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈(c1[↦]ℕ)∧ hs1[(~~>t ` c0)]hs0)), ∃(hs1,((hs1 : ℕ → c1)∧ hs1[(~~>t ` c0)]hs0)))

  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))

  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, c1stc), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c3)), wbr(cn, cdom, c3))), wbr(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cdom, cpw(c3)), wbr(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cdom, co(c1, cmap, cn)), wbr(co(c1, cmap, cn), cdom, cpw(c3)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, c1stc), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, cdom, cpw(c3)), wbr(cn, cdom, c3)), wbr(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cdom, co(c1, cmap, cn)))
